channel.title: Illegal start of an expression?
channel.description:
Hi,
After messing around a bit until the compiler was happy, i only had one error message
client.java:5215: illegal start of an expression public void addItemToSmith(int id, int slot, int column, int amount) ^
Making the p capital does nothing but make 9 errors. Meh.
thanks in advance,
nappymonster

item.title: Illegal start of an expression?
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

If this is for the compiler, may i reccommend the P compiler v 1.0.

Read full topic

item.title: Illegal start of an expression?

@nappymonster wrote:

Hi,

After messing around a bit until the compiler was happy, i only had one error message

^

Making the p capital does nothing but make 9 errors. Meh.
